Class AbstractWheelTextAdapter

java.lang.Object
  kankan.wheel.widget.AbstractWheelAdapter
      kankan.wheel.widget.AbstractWheelTextAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
WheelViewAdapter
Direct Known Subclasses:
AdapterWheel, ArrayWheelAdapter, NumericWheelAdapter, WheelView.WheelDataAdapter
public abstract class AbstractWheelTextAdapter
extends AbstractWheelAdapter

Abstract wheel adapter provides common functionality for adapters.
